Welcome

I am a Ph.D. student in the Computer Science Department at NYU. I got my Master degree from Fudan University and Bachelor degree from Nanjing University.

I used to be part of the IPADS group advised by Binyu Zang and Haibo Chen. I have spent 4 amazing years there working with a lot of talented researchers.

I'm also working with a group of enthusiastic and interesting guys in Italy who are working on their startup company WalletSaver. I helped build the mobile app on Android.
